title: How Did I Get Permabanned For This???

replies.body:
https://na.op.gg/summoner/userName=yankydoodledied2
Lvl  22 with a visible 14d ban on the 27/01. After a 14d ban, you are requested to be irreproachable. You were toxic again, hence the permaban. If it would have been your very very first offense, you may have only had chat restrictions.

Rules are simple and have been the same for almost 5 years. Getting permabanned on lvl22 account makes me believe you had a permaban on a previous account. If you dont make an effort to read/respect simple rules, bear the consequences. You are not permabanned because of this last single incident, you are permabanned because you kept breaking the rules.

"But officer, I saw people driving  way faster than me, how come Im punished and not them?" ----> useless defense because you are responsible for your own actions and you dont truly know what happens to other accounts.

EDIT: every time I see "reformed" "V2" or summoner name ending with a number, thats usually the sign of a smurf:
https://na.op.gg/summoner/userName=yankydoodledied
I guess you got permabanned on a lvl 43 on the 22/01 and a created an account right after. 
You show zero sign of reforming permaban after permaban, you belong to this even smaller group of people who must uninstall the game as soon as possible. Its unhealthy for you and unhealthy for the Community.

> im tryna CS 

The most depressing thing is OP can't even consistently farm 4 cs per minute on Caitlyn, yet he has the audience to flame his support the entire game. League really brings out the best of a person.

https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/player/NA/FeedKaylePlease
Lvl 24 spamming useless and vulgar statements all over the Boards, encouraging to break game rules. Ok, thank you for your valuable feedback. I wont ask how many banned account you have, we can see why you identify with OP.

Things that would tick me off if i was your teammate: You type in chat a word per line, you insult your Teemo support, spam the same message over and over,  blaming your support for your poor performance. 0% of your messages helped your team. I know you are being sarcastic when you say "How Did I Get Permabanned For This".

Is this a joke? You can't possibly be confused about how constant insults and spam resulted in a punishment, nor about how Riot will eventually get tired of your misbehavior and give you the boot entirely.

What an obnoxious player. You gotta stop  trying to get attention in games man. Your teammates arent your audience and no one actually cares about your opinions, so stop spamming and telling everyone every damn thought you have in your head. Just keep it in your head unless its a shotcall. Anything beyond that, no one cares. It was only a permaban because youve worked your way up to one. Had you not been punished multiple times before, this would just be a chat restrict probably.

You have to get banned multiple times before getting perm'd, including a 14-day ban. The 14 day should show a wake up call and you should know you're on your final strike. Just mute chat if you get chat banned and never look back, then you'll get the honor back and never have an issue again because you can't say anything to anyone. Its fantastic.

You can get an instant 14 day or perm though for super bad stuff like lots of racism and IRL death threats, but it doesnt sound like that here. Just mute chat when you first get warned.
I wish the number of permas gets quadrupled in 2020.... Swear once get ban... 0 flamers then

> [{quoted}](name=ThyDelutionist,realm=EUNE,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=35Jth0UJ,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2020-02-27T12:15:02.984+0000)
>
> I wish the number of permas gets quadrupled in 2020.... Swear once get ban... 0 flamers then

I wish they made 2 ques tbh, one where banter is allowed (Swearing but not hard flaming someone) and another where its not

> [{quoted}](name=CyberPhobic,realm=EUNE,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=35Jth0UJ,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2020-02-27T13:17:09.983+0000)
>
> one where banter is allowed (Swearing but not hard flaming someone) 

That's already how the system works. 

The next question is how you define banter, which I'm sure is not the same definition as Riot's.
LOOOOOOOOL.  Ban deserved.  GG NO RE.

https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn%3AANd9GcTwqZyPgBNG3Anf_WjtLIi0_Y-ZKMypRfX1ACf2NiEbM9R-mcbS

And aside from that, just don't say stuff to teammates. Probably the flaming there, OP!

You were banned because the vast majority of that log is very negative. What you say matters, but how you say it matters just as much. I tell my students this all the time but they donâ€™t listen and are then shocked when it gets them into trouble.

I do not get how that is perma ban. Yes i get that there were some moments that i flamed back but ligit i have seen people do worse and not get perma banned. Plus that was like my only game of being toxic on this acc after like 2 months so WHAT?!?!?!

It takes the average player 3 months of play time to drop a punishment tier. You were warned after your 14-day ban that any punishment would lead to a perma. 

Chances are you were being toxic without realizing that you were toxic. (E.g asking for reports). If you wrote into Riot support,  they would certainly tell you that you've been validly reported in at least 4 out of 20 of your recent games, so it's not just this only game you were toxic in.

I feel your pain OP. Yesterday I had a jungler that abused me for god knows what and just so out of the blue, my mid laner just comes top and steals my lane. The most funny thing out of all this was that they were calling for reports on me and saying I was trolling because I decided to afk after that. Good thing I didn't type that much or else I might have been punished. I was furious but I kept it inside. Tried my hardest not to explode in chat.
